title: DATS study group schema
description: A collection of entities known as study subjects based on a set of specified criteria and rules; synonyms: population, cohort.

identifier.description: The identifier of the study group.

alternateIdentifiers.description: Alternate identifiers for the study group.

name.description: The name of the study group.

keywords.description: a set of annotations to characterize the study group.

size.description: The number of members in the group.

members.description: The entities making up the study group.

consentInformation.description: The consent information related to this study group.

extraProperties.description: Extra properties that do not fit in the previous specified attributes.
